short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Weather App is designed to be as simple & intuitive as possible. You can check the weather condition of specific locations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's now easy to get updated with the weather conditions instantly on your location as well as another location's. Weather app provides detailed weather report & also provides current temperature in Celsius, wind speed, humidity, location coordinates
